Posts.Content: Jun 16, 2017 04:34AM Mconcerned wrote: I've had a similar situation and described the pain as the same as you do. I've seen 2 breast surgeons, had 2 mammos, 2 ultrasounds and 1 MRI (over the course of 2 years). They all say no need to biopsy, and the lump I feel doesn't show up on imaging. My pain does come and go (sometimes it seems that it may be with my cycle, but not always. I'm curious to hear what your surgeon suggests...
Posts.Title: They said it's not cancer but what is it? And what now? Goingforgold MinusTwo
